paragraph: David Parker (born 1951) is an American sound engineer. He won two Academy Awards for Best Sound and was nominated for another five in the same category. He has worked on more than 180 films since 1980.
Parker won two Academy Awards for Best Sound and was nominated for another five:
Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)
The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)
The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011)
